channel.title: Bank pin wont save

item.title: Bank pin wont save
item.dc:creator: @Pandora7 Pandora7
item.description:
@Pandora7 wrote:

Every time when i make up a bank pin, it doesn’t save into my character files. when i re log and retype ANY 4 digit numbers, it still works? Can someone help me fix my bank bin and make it saved? Thanks for reading

playersave.java:

[QUOTE] } else if (token.equals(“bankPin”)) {
p.bankPin = token2;
} else if (token.equals(“setPin”)) {
p.setPin = Boolean.parseBoolean(token2);[/QUOTE]

[QUOTE]characterfile.write("setPin = ", 0, 9);
characterfile.write(Boolean.toString(p.setPin), 0, Boolean.toString(p.setPin).length());
characterfile.newLine();
characterfile.write("bankPin = ", 0, 10);
characterfile.write(p.bankPin, 0, p.bankPin.length());
characterfile.newLine();[/QUOTE]
